    • storage

    The general API between the chrome.storage and the extension. This is the part throughout which we get and set, store and retrieve, data that is concerned with the application. This module has one purpose only: getting and setting Due to asynchronousness this is all done through promises

    Methods

    (inner) clearLogs()

    Removes all the logs from the storage. This is run after we update the logfile in chrome.local.storage

    (inner) getAll(callback)

    Gets everything TDS stores from the storage. Also parses all data that needs to be deserialized.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    callback function

    function that takes the result of this get as parameter

    (inner) getAllUnParsed(callback)

    Gets everything TDS stores from the storage. This does not parse any data that needs to be deserialized.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    callback function

    function that takes the result of this get as parameter

    (inner) getBlacklist(callback)

    Gets the BlockedSiteList from the storage and parses it, before passing it on to the callback

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    callback function

    function that takes the result of this get as parameter

    (inner) getBlacklistPromise() → {Promise}

    Gets a promise to the @link BlockedSiteList in the storage

    Returns:
    Type:
    Promise

    (inner) getExerciseTimeList()

    Gets the ExerciseTime array from the storage

    (inner) getInterceptCounter()

    Gets the current interceptCount from the storage.

    (inner) getInterceptDateList()

    Gets the current InterceptDatelist.

    (inner) getLogs(callback)

    Gets the logs from the storage and passes it on to the callback

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    callback function

    takes the logs once we get them from the storage

    (inner) getMode(callback)

    Gets the current mode in the settings from the storage.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    callback function

    function to be called that takes the mode as parameter

    (inner) getSettings(callback)

    Gets the UserSettings from the storage and parses it, before passing it on to the callback

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    callback function

    function that takes the result of this get as parameter

    (inner) getSettingsUnParsed(callback)

    Gets an unparsed version of the UserSettings from the storage

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    callback

    function that takes this unparsed output

    (inner) setBlacklist(blockedSiteList)

    Serializes and then sets the BlockedSiteList in the storage.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    blockedSiteList BlockedSiteList

    function that takes the result of this get as parameter

    (inner) setExerciseTimeList(statList)

    Sets the exerciseTime array into the storage

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    statList array

    the new value of the exerciseTime array

    (inner) setInterceptCounter(number)

    Sets the interceptCounter to a new value

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    number int

    the new value of the counter

    (inner) setInterceptDateList(dateList)

    Sets the current dateList in the storage

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    dateList array

    the new value of the dateList to be set

    (inner) setLogFile(data)

    Sets the logfile into the storage

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    data string

    the logfile to be stored in loca.storage

    (inner) setLogs(logs)

    Sets the logs in the storage

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    logs string

    the logs to be stored in local.storage

    (inner) setSettings(settingsObject)

    Serializes and then sets the UserSettings in the storage.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    settingsObject UserSettings

    The object we want to set in the storage

    (inner) setSettingsWithCallback(settingsObject, callback)

    Serializes and then sets the UserSettings in the storage, after this it calls the callback function.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    settingsObject UserSettings

    The object we want to set in the storage
    callback function

    the function to be called once we return
